casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Melvin Lee WHITE, Jr. 505P96-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 15, 2017 *877Kristin D. Parks, Attorney at Law, Richard McNeil, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for White, Melvin Lee, Jr. L. Michael Dodd, Special Deputy Attorney General, Scott E. Thomas, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of June 2017 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of June 2017."
